title: Bug 120315If the display property of an item is set to "none", it doesn't take effect in new pdf emitter.
OB: Bug 120315If the display property of an item is set to "none", it doesn't take effect in new pdf emitter.
EB: Preview in PDF.Expected result: the label disappears.Actual result: the label is still visible.
SR: Description: If the display property of an item is set to "null", it doesn't take effect in new pdf emitter.steps to reproduce:1. Add a label.2. Open "properties" view.3. Set sectionDisplay as "none".4.
